responses.rationale: The segment reports the location of cases but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment reports confirmation of the virus but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment reports the number of states with cases but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment explains a spread mechanism but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment reports an annual production number but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment reports state status and population data but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment reports the number of birds killed but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment reports the total number of birds killed nationally but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment reports new infections and birds killed but contains no explicit calming language.
